reviews.text:
The bus replacement service from Redhill is a shambles today as usual.  The bus from Redhill to Salfords Station is scheduled to drop passengers at the end of the road. But Southern have not allowed enough time for people to walk from the bus stop on the main road to salfords station.  This morning lots of people missed their scheduled connection at Salfords even though the bus was on time.of course there was no one at Salfords to manage this mess. 
 Is it really that difficult to get this right after years of experience of bus replacement?

Train station is so filthy. There is rubbish on the floors, especially the stairs leading on to platform 3.
I have never seen a cleaner  picking litter on the station in my past 5 years of travel through the station. 
Very disappointing. The administration cannot even get someone to clear the rubbish????

This must be the worst station in all of "Southern Region ". 
Having a job here is better than winning the lottery..
At 22.50 this evening there were three transport police having a laugh in the booking hall. I did enquire if a terrorist incident was expected  , but they  responded to with a laugh.
On platform 1/1A, there were 3. staff.
 one reading the paper, 
One on his phone, and the other bearly awake.. .
Mr. Grating should really see what's going in.
Nice station with lots of shelter and ticketing facilities
